detail_desc: STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, zebra-striped organic cotton. Worn details around the neckline and decorative stitching around the sleeves and hem.
Shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-style cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with low dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves with a lace section.
Short-sleeved shirt in airy, softly draping viscose with a resort collar, French front and yoke at the back. Regular Fit.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Chunky metal chain bracelet. Length 19 cm.
Straight-cut shirt jacket in soft pile with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, front pockets and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in a rustle weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a zipped back pocket. Legs with contrasting colour side stripes. Mesh lining.

Shoulder bag in soft imitation leather that can also be used as a clutch. Concealed magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Height approx. 18 cm. Width approx. 26 cm.

Lightweight parka in a textured-weave cotton blend. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring and foldover front edge and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hem. Mesh lining.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in a soft viscose weave. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the hem. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and a frill trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with faux-fur appliqués, sequins and embroidery. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey with printed contrasting colour panels at the sides.

Short dress in velour with an opening with a decorative flounce at the back and a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with a short flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Maxi dress in an airy weave with braided details, a double layer at the top and a seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a stand-up collar and half-zip at the top with a round pull.
Top in thin sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length jersey dress with draped sides, short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and gathers at one side.

Jacket in washed denim with buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and adjustable tabs at the sides of the hem. The jacket has hard-worn details and has been treated to give it a used, slightly dirty look. These effects mean the appearance of each jacket can vary.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. T-shirt in soft, patterned organic cotton slub jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
V-neck body in airy jersey with a slight sheen. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves and draping at the front. Seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and front pockets.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with a collar and lower section in a cotton weave, and a rounded hem.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Metal rings in various designs.
Turban in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, jetted front pockets and no buttons. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Metal earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Length 5 cm.
Fitted jacket in a pinstriped weave with notch lapels, a button at the front, welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with elastication in the shaft.
Shirt in airy Tencel™ lyocell with a collar, short lapels, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with cuffs. Gently rounded at the hem.

Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and zipped front pockets for safe storage of valuables. Extra-long sleeves with thumbholes to help keep you warm while exercising outside. The sleeves are in a raglan cut to minimise the risk of friction from the seams.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, low-cut back and decorative lacing at the sides.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hi-tops in canvas and mesh with a rubber print and plastic details. Padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a low-cut back with crossover straps. Medium coverage at the back.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton with an elasticated waist and wide ribbing at the hems.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and narrow ties at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey inner dress.
Skirt in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy. Waist with covered elastication, a gathered top edge and a decorative bow with tassels at the front. Glittery tulle frill trim at the hem.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Short skater skirt in heavy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Leather loafers with leather linings and insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Cropped blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, short raglan sleeves and smocking around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a lace yoke with frills and short cap sleeves.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, large buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and side pockets. Gently rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back and front. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Satin dressing gown with a sewn-in tie belt and concealed tie at the waist.
Slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum movement. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the top, and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Large, rolled hair elastics in elasticated jersey.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with a high, wrapover funnel collar with a decorative drawstring at the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide neckline, elastication and a broderie anglaise flounce at the top, and a smocked hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a fake jetted chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups,and a rounded hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with gathered frill trims around the neckline and sleeves.
